AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Tactical drone
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was assimilated and fitted with a number of prosthetics designed to operate the weapon systems and maintenance of attack and defense vessels and equipment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Maintenance drone
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} assimilated and assigned to function primarily as a maintenance drone - they lack the skills and implants to effectively function on the battlefield, but can be used in a pinch.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Medical drone
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was assimilated and fitted with a number of prosthetics designed to better operate the medical and maintenance equipment for recharging stations, prosthetic development and implantation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Borg collective
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a productive member of the hivemind Their technological and biological distinctiveness contributes to the efforts of the collective, and this synchronous mind has improved most aspects of borg skills and abilities.
